headline: EL LOCO DEL MARTILLO
author: NA
content: The article recounts a tragic crime where Climaco Basom, an ex-student of San La Mani school, killed his friend's sister Alexandra Brenes (16) and attacked housemaid Ida Merino (28). The incident occurred during a band rehearsal at the friend's house. Climaco, reportedly under the influence of cocaine, attacked Ida with a hammer, causing her severe injuries, while Alexandra died from multiple blows. Sebasli√°n Lescano, another friend, intervened but was only able to prevent further violence. The police arrived and found the victims, with Climaco repeating he didn't remember the events. During his trial, psychologists deemed him dangerous in freedom, as he showed no remorse.
